• Apoyo presencial a ejecución de procesos de instalación de los proyectos en Estados Unidos e integración de los procesos con las diferentes áreas en Colombia

company.name: BELT Art+Design Studio
company.description:
BELT Bespoke Metal Artwork
dreamers•artists•designers•makers
creating timeless pieces
Bespoke Metal Design Studio | Est. 1985

Visit our Showroom - 3000 Stirling Road, #104, Hollywood, FL 33021.
New York | Palm Beach | Miami | World by Appt

We are a family-owned company founded in 1985 by architect, sculptor, and artist Louis Beltran and architect Angela Garcia. With background and studies in architecture, product design and fine art from the most well-known schools in Paris.

Our pieces embed craftsmanship and old world techniques with integrated contemporary technology to deliver the very best quality to our clients. Our team of experts includes designers, architects, engineers, installers and specialty craftsmen like blacksmiths or metal experts in casting, repoussage, chiseling, and patinas. 

We collaborate with architects, builders, interior designers, project owners, and developers, to fully interpret their dreams and needs to materialize them in beautiful designs and artworks in metal.
a
With projects all over the world, we are available by appointment and have full-time local design consultants in New York Metro, Miami, Palm Beach, and Naples ready to work in your dream project.

Join our Dream Team by clicking here https://linktr.ee/peoplebelt
